com.stripe.android.view

Class BecsDebitWidget

  • com.stripe.android.view.BecsDebitWidget

  • public class BecsDebitWidget

    A form for accepting a customer's BECS account information.

    A company name is required to render this widget. A company name can either be specified by passing it to the class BecsDebitWidget constructor, or via XML:

    See Also:
    class BecsDebitWidget

        public PaymentMethodCreateParams getParams()
